name: Invox Finance
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
The Invox Finance Platform is an invoice lending platform disrupting a US$2.8 trillion industry. Lead by a stellar team with over $30 million of invoice financing behind them, Invox Finance is creating a decentralised peer-to-peer invoice lending platform that will allow sellers, buyers, investors, and other service providers to directly connect, interact, share and distribute information.

Soft Cap : reached already.

ico_data.short_desc: Setting out to disrupt the the US$2.85 trillion dollar invoice financing industry with a stellar team that has years of experience, Invox Finance is reimagining invoice financing by creating dynamic invoices on a distributed ledger to connect Sellers, Buyer and Investors seamlessly and transparently.
